00236 
00237 // void set_assays_numbers(const unsigned int&, const unsigned int&) method
00238 
00242 
00243 void ModelSelection::set_assays_numbers(const unsigned int& new_complexity_assays_number, const unsigned int& new_parameters_assays_number)
00244 {
00245    // Control sentence (if debug)
00246 
00247    #ifdef _DEBUG 
00248 
00249    if(!training_strategy_pointer) 
00250    {
00251       std::ostringstream buffer;
00252 
00253       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00254              << "void set_assays_numbers(const unsigned int&, const unsigned int&) method.\n"
00255              << "Pointer to training strategy is NULL.\n";
00256 
00257       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00258    }   
00259 
00260    if(training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer() == NULL) 
00261    {
00262       std::ostringstream buffer;
00263 
00264       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00265              << "void set_assays_numbers(const unsigned int&, const unsigned int&) method.\n"
00266              << "Pointer to performance functional is NULL.\n";      
00267 
00268       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00269    }   
00270 
00271    if(training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer()->get_neural_network_pointer() == NULL) 
00272    {
00273       std::ostringstream buffer;
00274 
00275       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00276              << "void set_assays_numbers(const unsigned int&, const unsigned int&) method.\n"
00277              << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron is NULL.\n";
00278 
00279       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00280    }   
00281 
00282    #endif
00283    
00284    hidden_perceptrons_numbers.set(new_complexity_assays_number);
00285 
00286 //   unsigned int inputs_number = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer()->get_multilayer_perceptron_pointer()->count_inputs_number();
00287 //   unsigned int outputs_number = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer()->get_multilayer_perceptron_pointer()->count_outputs_number();
00288 
00289 //   unsigned int minimum_hidden_layer_size = (int)sqrt((double)(inputs_number*inputs_number) + (double)(outputs_number*outputs_number));
00290 //   unsigned int maximum_hidden_layer_size = 2*(int)sqrt((double)(inputs_number*inputs_number) + (double)(outputs_number*outputs_number));
00291 
00292 
00293    unsigned int minimum_hidden_layer_size = 1;
00294    unsigned int maximum_hidden_layer_size = 12;
00295 
00296    int hidden_layer_size_increment = (maximum_hidden_layer_size-minimum_hidden_layer_size)/new_complexity_assays_number;
00297 
00298    if(hidden_layer_size_increment < 1)
00299    {
00300       hidden_layer_size_increment = 1;
00301    }
00302 
00303    for(unsigned int i = 0; i < new_complexity_assays_number; i++)
00304    {
00305       hidden_perceptrons_numbers[i] = minimum_hidden_layer_size + hidden_layer_size_increment*i;  
00306    } 
00307 
00308    parameters_assays_number = new_parameters_assays_number;
00309 }

00402 // void check(void) const method
00403 
00405 
00406 void ModelSelection::check(void) const
00407 {
00408    // Training algorithm stuff
00409 
00410   std::ostringstream buffer;
00411 
00412    if(!training_strategy_pointer) 
00413    {
00414       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00415              << "void check(void) const method.\n"
00416              << "Pointer to training strategy is NULL.\n";
00417 
00418       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00419    }   
00420 
00421    // Performance functional stuff
00422 
00423    const PerformanceFunctional* performance_functional_pointer = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer();
00424 
00425    if(!performance_functional_pointer) 
00426    {
00427       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00428              << "void check(void) const method.\n"
00429              << "Pointer to performance functional is NULL.\n";      
00430 
00431       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00432    }   
00433 
00434    // Neural network stuff
00435 
00436    const NeuralNetwork* neural_network_pointer = performance_functional_pointer->get_neural_network_pointer(); 
00437 
00438    if(!neural_network_pointer) 
00439    {
00440       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00441              << "void check(void) const method.\n"
00442              << "Pointer to neural network is NULL.\n";
00443 
00444       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00445    }   
00446 
00447    const MultilayerPerceptron* multilayer_perceptron_pointer = neural_network_pointer->get_multilayer_perceptron_pointer();
00448 
00449    if(!multilayer_perceptron_pointer) 
00450    {
00451       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00452              << "void check(void) const method.\n"
00453              << "Pointer to multilayer perceptron is NULL.\n";
00454 
00455       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00456    }   
00457 
00458 }
00459 
00460 
00461 // ModelSelectionResults perform_model_inputs_selection(void) const method
00462 
00464 
00465 ModelSelection::ModelSelectionResults ModelSelection::perform_model_inputs_selection(void) const
00466 {
00467    std::ostringstream buffer;
00468 
00469    buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00470           << "ModelSelectionResults perform_model_inputs_selection(void) const method.\n"
00471           << "This method is under development.\n";
00472 
00473    throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00474 /*
00475    #ifdef _DEBUG 
00476 
00477    check();
00478 
00479    #endif
00480 
00481    // Training strategy stuff
00482 
00483    // Performance functional stuff
00484 
00485    const PerformanceFunctional* performance_functional_pointer = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer();
00486 
00487    // Neural network stuff
00488 
00489    NeuralNetwork* neural_network_pointer = performance_functional_pointer->get_neural_network_pointer(); 
00490 
00491    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayer_perceptron_pointer = neural_network_pointer->get_multilayer_perceptron_pointer();
00492 
00493    #ifdef _DEBUG 
00494 
00495    const unsigned int layers_number = multilayer_perceptron_pointer->count_layers_number();
00496 
00497    if(layers_number != 2) 
00498    {
00499      std::ostringstream buffer;
00500 
00501       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00502              << "ModelSelectionResults perform_model_inputs_selection(void) method.\n"
00503              << "Number of layers in multilayer perceptron must be two.\n";
00504 
00505       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00506    }   
00507 
00508    #endif
00509 
00510    // Model order selection stuff
00511 
00512    const unsigned int inputs_assays_number = hidden_perceptrons_numbers.size();
00513 
00514    ModelSelectionResults model_selection_results;
00515    model_selection_results.parameters_data.set(inputs_assays_number, parameters_assays_number);
00516    model_selection_results.evaluation_data.set(inputs_assays_number, parameters_assays_number);
00517    model_selection_results.generalization_evaluation_data.set(inputs_assays_number, parameters_assays_number);
00518 
00519    time_t beginning_time, current_time;
00520    time(&beginning_time);
00521    double elapsed_time;
00522 
00523    unsigned int assay_count = 0;
00524 
00525    for(unsigned int i = 0; i < inputs_assays_number; i++)
00526    {
00527       //multilayer_perceptron_pointer->set_inputs_number(1);
00528 
00529       for(unsigned int j = 0; j < parameters_assays_number; j++)
00530           {
00531          try
00532                  {
00533             assay_count++; 
00534 
00535                         // Multilayer perceptron
00536 
00537             multilayer_perceptron_pointer->initialize_parameters_normal();
00538 
00539                         // Performance functional 
00540 
00541                         // Training algorithm
00542 
00543                 training_strategy_pointer->perform_training();
00544            
00545                         // Model order selection
00546 
00547                     model_selection_results.parameters_data[i][j] = multilayer_perceptron_pointer->arrange_parameters();
00548 
00549                     model_selection_results.evaluation_data[i][j] = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer()->calculate_evaluation();
00550                     model_selection_results.generalization_evaluation_data[i][j] = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer()->calculate_generalization_evaluation();                      
00551 
00552             time(&current_time);
00553             elapsed_time = difftime(current_time, beginning_time);
00554 
00555                         if(display)
00556                         {
00557                std::cout << "Assay " << assay_count << ";\n"
00558                          << "Hidden layer size: " << hidden_perceptrons_numbers[i] << "\n"
00559                          << "Parameters set: " << j+1 << "\n"
00560                                                  << "Evaluation: " << model_selection_results.evaluation_data[i][j] << "\n"
00561                                                  << "Generalization evaluation: " << model_selection_results.generalization_evaluation_data[i][j] << "\n"
00562                                                  << "Elapsed time: " << elapsed_time << std::endl;
00563                         }
00564                  }
00565          catch(std::logic_error& e)
00566          {
00567             std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00568          }
00569       }
00570    }
00571 
00572    const Vector<unsigned int> minimal_indices = model_selection_results.generalization_evaluation_data.calculate_minimal_indices();
00573 
00574    const Vector<double> minimal_parameters = model_selection_results.parameters_data[minimal_indices [0]][minimal_indices[1]];
00575 
00576    multilayer_perceptron_pointer->set_parameters(minimal_parameters);
00577 
00578    return(model_selection_results);
00579 */
00580 }

00582 
00583 // ModelSelectionResults perform_model_order_selection(void) method
00584 
00586 
00587 ModelSelection::ModelSelectionResults ModelSelection::perform_model_order_selection(void) const
00588 {
00589    std::ostringstream buffer;
00590 
00591    buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00592           << "ModelSelectionResults perform_model_order_selection(void) method.\n"
00593           << "This method is under development.\n";
00594 
00595    throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00596 /*
00597    // Training algorithm stuff
00598 
00599    #ifdef _DEBUG 
00600 
00601    check();
00602 
00603    #endif
00604 
00605    // Performance functional stuff
00606 
00607    const PerformanceFunctional* performance_functional_pointer = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer();
00608 
00609    DataSet* data_set_pointer = performance_functional_pointer->get_objective_term_pointer()->get_data_set_pointer();
00610 
00611    VariablesInformation* variables_information_pointer = data_set_pointer->get_variables_information_pointer();
00612 
00613    // Neural network stuff
00614 
00615    NeuralNetwork* neural_network_pointer = performance_functional_pointer->get_neural_network_pointer(); 
00616 
00617    MultilayerPerceptron* multilayer_perceptron_pointer = neural_network_pointer->get_multilayer_perceptron_pointer();
00618 
00619    #ifdef _DEBUG 
00620 
00621    const unsigned int layers_number = multilayer_perceptron_pointer->count_layers_number();
00622 
00623    if(layers_number != 2) 
00624    {
00625      std::ostringstream buffer;
00626 
00627       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00628              << "ModelSelectionResults perform_model_order_selection(void) method.\n"
00629              << "Number of layers in multilayer perceptron must be two.\n";
00630 
00631       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str().c_str());
00632    }   
00633 
00634    #endif
00635 
00636    // Model order selection stuff
00637 
00638    const unsigned int complexity_assays_number = hidden_perceptrons_numbers.size();
00639 
00640    ModelSelectionResults model_order_selection_results;
00641 
00642    if(reserve_parameters_data)
00643    {
00644       model_order_selection_results.parameters_data.set(complexity_assays_number, parameters_assays_number);
00645    }  
00646          
00647    if(reserve_evaluation_data)
00648    {
00649       model_order_selection_results.evaluation_data.set(complexity_assays_number, parameters_assays_number);
00650    }
00651 
00652    if(reserve_generalization_evaluation_data)
00653    {
00654       model_order_selection_results.generalization_evaluation_data.set(complexity_assays_number, parameters_assays_number);
00655    }
00656 
00657    time_t beginning_time, current_time;
00658    time(&beginning_time);
00659    double elapsed_time;
00660 
00661    unsigned int assay_count = 0;
00662 
00663    for(unsigned int i = 0; i < complexity_assays_number; i++)
00664    {
00665           variables_information_pointer->set_inputs_indices(inputs_indices[i]);
00666 
00667       //multilayer_perceptron_pointer->set_layer_perceptrons_number(0, hidden_perceptrons_numbers[i]);
00668 
00669       for(unsigned int j = 0; j < parameters_assays_number; j++)
00670           {
00671          try
00672                  {
00673             assay_count++; 
00674 
00675                         // Multilayer perceptron
00676 
00677             multilayer_perceptron_pointer->initialize_parameters_normal();
00678 
00679                         // Performance functional 
00680 
00681                         // Training algorithm
00682 
00683                 training_strategy_pointer->perform_training();
00684            
00685                         // Model order selection
00686 
00687             if(reserve_parameters_data)
00688             {
00689                        model_order_selection_results.parameters_data[i][j] = multilayer_perceptron_pointer->arrange_parameters();
00690                         }
00691 
00692             if(reserve_parameters_data)
00693             {
00694                        model_order_selection_results.evaluation_data[i][j] = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer()->calculate_evaluation();
00695                         }
00696 
00697             if(reserve_parameters_data)
00698             {
00699                        model_order_selection_results.generalization_evaluation_data[i][j] = training_strategy_pointer->get_performance_functional_pointer()->calculate_generalization_evaluation();                     
00700                         }
00701 
00702             time(&current_time);
00703             elapsed_time = difftime(current_time, beginning_time);
00704 
00705                         if(display)
00706                         {
00707                std::cout << "Assay " << assay_count << ";\n"
00708                          << "Hidden layer size: " << hidden_perceptrons_numbers[i] << "\n"
00709                          << "Parameters set: " << j+1 << "\n"
00710                                                  << "Evaluation: " << model_order_selection_results.evaluation_data[i][j] << "\n"
00711                                                  << "Generalization performance: " << model_order_selection_results.generalization_evaluation_data[i][j] << "\n"
00712                                                  << "Elapsed time: " << elapsed_time << std::endl;
00713                         }
00714                  }
00715          catch(std::logic_error& e)
00716          {
00717             std::cerr << e.what() << std::endl;
00718          }
00719       }
00720    }
00721 
00722 
00723    Vector<unsigned int> minimal_indices = model_order_selection_results.generalization_evaluation_data.calculate_minimal_indices();
00724 
00725    Vector<double> minimal_parameters = model_order_selection_results.parameters_data[minimal_indices [0]][minimal_indices[1]];
00726 
00727    multilayer_perceptron_pointer->set_parameters(minimal_parameters);
00728 
00729    if(reserve_minimal_parameters)
00730    {
00731    }
00732 
00733 // Vector< Vector<double> > calculate_performance_data_statistics(const ModelSelectionResults&) const method
00734 //   return(model_order_selection_data.performance_data.calculate_transpose().calculate_statistics());  
00735 
00736 // Vector< Vector<double> > calculate_generalization_evaluation_data_statistics(const ModelSelectionResults&) const method
00737    //   return(model_order_selection_data.generalization_evaluation_data.calculate_transpose().calculate_statistics());  
00738 
00739 //   unsigned int complexities_number = hidden_perceptrons_numbers.size();
00740 
00741 //   file << "# Performance data\n\n";
00742 
00743 //   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < complexities_number; i++)
00744 //   {    
00745 //      file << hidden_perceptrons_numbers[i] << " ";
00746 
00747 //      for(unsigned int j = 0; j < parameters_assays_number; j++)

00753 //   }

00797 // TiXmlElement* to_XML(void) const method
00798 
00801 
00802 TiXmlElement* ModelSelection::to_XML(void) const
00803 {
00804    std::ostringstream buffer; 
00805 
00806    // Model order selection
00807 
00808    TiXmlElement* model_order_selection_element = new TiXmlElement("ModelSelection");
00809    model_order_selection_element->SetAttribute("Version", 4);
00810 
00811    // Hidden layer sizes
00812 
00813    TiXmlElement* hidden_perceptrons_numbers_element = new TiXmlElement("HiddenLayerSizes");
00814    model_order_selection_element->LinkEndChild(hidden_perceptrons_numbers_element);
00815 
00816    buffer.str("");
00817    buffer << hidden_perceptrons_numbers;
00818 
00819    TiXmlText* hidden_perceptrons_numbers_text = new TiXmlText(buffer.str().c_str());
00820    hidden_perceptrons_numbers_element->LinkEndChild(hidden_perceptrons_numbers_text);
00821 
00822    // ParametersAssaysNumber
00823 
00824    TiXmlElement* parameters_assays_number_element = new TiXmlElement("ParametersAssaysNumber");
00825    model_order_selection_element->LinkEndChild(parameters_assays_number_element);
00826 
00827    buffer.str("");
00828    buffer << parameters_assays_number;
00829 
00830    TiXmlText* parameters_assays_number_text = new TiXmlText(buffer.str().c_str());
00831    parameters_assays_number_element->LinkEndChild(parameters_assays_number_text);
00832 
00833    return(model_order_selection_element);
00834 }

00856 // void save(const std::string&) const method
00857 
00860 
00861 void ModelSelection::save(const std::string& filename) const
00862 {
00863    TiXmlDocument document;
00864 
00865    // Declaration
00866 
00867    TiXmlDeclaration* declaration = new TiXmlDeclaration("1.0", "", "");
00868    document.LinkEndChild(declaration);
00869 
00870    // Model selection element
00871 
00872    TiXmlElement* model_selection_element = to_XML();
00873    document.LinkEndChild(model_selection_element);
00874 
00875    // Save
00876 
00877    document.SaveFile(filename.c_str());
00878 }

00880 
00881 // void load(const std::string&) method
00882 
00885 
00886 void ModelSelection::load(const std::string& filename)
00887 {
00888    std::ostringstream buffer;
00889 
00890    TiXmlDocument document(filename.c_str());
00891 
00892    if (!document.LoadFile())
00893    {
00894       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00895              << "void load(const std::string&) method.\n"
00896              << "Cannot load XML file " << filename << ".\n";
00897 
00898       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str());
00899    }
00900 
00901    // Root
00902    
00903    TiXmlElement* model_order_selection_element = document.FirstChildElement("ModelSelection");
00904 
00905    if(!model_order_selection_element)
00906    {
00907       buffer << "OpenNN Exception: ModelSelection class.\n"
00908              << "void load(const std::string&) method.\n"
00909              << "Invalid model order selection XML root element.\n";
00910 
00911       throw std::logic_error(buffer.str());
00912    }
00913     
00914    // Hidden layer sizes
00915    
00916    TiXmlElement* hidden_perceptrons_numbers_element = model_order_selection_element->FirstChildElement("HiddenLayerSizes");
00917 
00918    if(hidden_perceptrons_numbers_element)
00919    {
00920       Vector<unsigned int> new_hidden_perceptrons_numbers;
00921       new_hidden_perceptrons_numbers.parse(hidden_perceptrons_numbers_element->GetText());
00922 
00923       try
00924       {
00925          set_hidden_perceptrons_numbers(new_hidden_perceptrons_numbers);
00926       }
00927       catch(std::exception& e)
00928       {
00929          std::cout << e.what() << std::endl;             
00930       }
00931    }
00932 
00933    // Parameters assays number
00934    
00935    TiXmlElement* parameters_assays_number_element = model_order_selection_element->FirstChildElement("ParametersAssaysNumber");
00936 
00937    if(parameters_assays_number_element)
00938    {
00939       parameters_assays_number = atoi(parameters_assays_number_element->GetText());           
00940    }
00941 }
00942 
00943 }
